Name: Leech Seed
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 1. Spend 1 Will point to activate. At the end of the Round, Roll 2 Dice of Typeless Damage against the target. Ignore defenses. The User heals 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. Grass-Type Pok√©mon are immune to this Effect.
Description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.
